channel.title: English – 245 Swirling Quills
channel.description: Maybe a bit of my mind?

item.title: A (Swolen) chat
item.dc:creator: Quills
item.content:encoded:
VOID!!

Oh hi Grex! Uuh, something happened?

I’M GONNA DO A FLIP JUST WATCH IT!!

Huh?

Fails and falls with his muzzle on the floor

GREX ARE YOU OKAY!?

I’m alright…
Ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch ouch my nose!

Oh no, wait there i’ll get some ice or something

No, wait!

Aaand there she goes

(Why does my cool side never show up in these momentsâ€¦)

item.title: Birthday
item.dc:creator: Quills
item.description: Oh yeah, almost forgot, today is my birthday!I’ve already wrote a lot so i’ll keep this short, Happy birthday for me i supposeSo from today now i guess i’m 18… No, don’t call me an adult, never said you could :< Hmm, don’t wanna make this post seem unnecessarily sad, but i don’t know how […]
item.content:encoded:
Oh yeah, almost forgot, today is my birthday!
I’ve already wrote a lot so i’ll keep this short, Happy birthday for me i suppose
So from today now i guess i’m 18…

No, don’t call me an adult, never said you could :<

Hmm, don’t wanna make this post seem unnecessarily sad, but i don’t know how to, i mean, i never really wanted to grow up…
Okay i’m stopping, anyway, thanks for reading!
Remember that you’re awesome, but also that you should always respect and be kind to the other people, bye bye!

item.title: Cutelescence overflow
item.dc:creator: Quills
item.description: Soooooooooooooo!Me be back, again, yeah it haven’t been very long, yes technically this went online at the same time as the other new posts, but that is not what i’m here to talk about!I’m here to talk about cute horseys, so i’m starting this little thing that’s totally not just a personal, simpler and smaller […]
item.content:encoded:
Soooooooooooooo!
Me be back, again, yeah it haven’t been very long, yes technically this went online at the same time as the other new posts, but that is not what i’m here to talk about!
I’m here to talk about cute horseys, so i’m starting this little thing that’s totally not just a personal, simpler and smaller equestria daily Pony art gallery, with the intention of saving, separating, and showing some particularly cute stuff i find on Derpibooru or pretty much anywhere else, yeah Derpibooru has faves but it’s organized by chronological order, so sometimes something i find and really like gets lost below all the other stuff that i also found and really like.
Okay just remembered about Derpibooru galeries… but i never used those and it’s cool to have something like this so i’ll just ignore that, i wanna share some of my finds too after all, and while i’m into that i guess i can also leave some comments.

To the pones!

As always, click on the images for source!

I don’t have words to describe what i feel, so much cute
A very colorful kirin

You heard her!
Love the concept of small Dashie (wait no she’s NOT small!!), and love tsunderDashie, peak Dashie love!

Hi lil bundle of joy!!!

I feel lightweight, So precious…

This one (and the following) been stored on my faves for a while but i really needed to put this on a more findable place :3

Dorbs, somecreature help that deer!

I LOVE DEERS! (Lumiere noises on the back)

Aaand that’s it, this is all for today!


Now that i look at it, this does make me look like a RD fanatic… I mean she IS awesome, but we all know i’m bad with this choosing favorites thing so no assumptions right? It’s not my fault i happened to find so many cute dashies this time! I’ll make posts with other pones too eventually, you’ll see!
And this had Derpy, I’ve already made clear I love that mare before too right?
Derps!!

item.title: Multilanguage Update!
item.dc:creator: Quills
item.description: Soo, as you may have seen, a random Fanfic thing appeared, well that one is something I’ve created some time ago in private motivated by a school homework (dunno if i’ve mentioned it on mastodon or not but anyway) and thought “hey, why not post it here, ain’t this supposed to be a mind dump? […]
item.content:encoded: Soo, as you may have seen, a random Fanfic thing appeared, well that one is something I’ve created some time ago in private motivated by a school homework (dunno if i’ve mentioned it on mastodon or not but anyway) and thought “hey, why not post it here, ain’t this supposed to be a mind dump? but it’s on Portuguese, and i did the whole site in English!” So i’ve went and created language categories, don’t feel like translating the whole site, and i’m not sure how i’d do that without making it ugly so general stuff will stay in English only for now, but i plan to post stuff in Portuguese when i feel like it too (even tho in that case there will be basically no one to read it haha, but then, not like this place is made with being read by many as an objective so it’s not really an issue) anyway, i digress. The important part is that now the website has the minimum structure to organize multiple languages so yay!

item.title: My latest musical “obsession”
item.dc:creator: Quills
item.description: This will probably be a short one, and something that would probably go better on mastodon but this needs more content :P Since like, idk, 3 days? i’ve got suddenly super hooked on the album Destiny by MathematicPony, it was really out of nowhere, i had downloaded it to my jellyfin server cuz i’ve listened […]
item.content:encoded:
This will probably be a short one, and something that would probably go better on mastodon but this needs more content :P

Since like, idk, 3 days? i’ve got suddenly super hooked on the album Destiny by MathematicPony, it was really out of nowhere, i had downloaded it to my jellyfin server cuz i’ve listened to two or three songs from it before and liked them, so they just sat in there, till i actually felt like giving the album a go and wow, almost the entire album got stuck in my head, another great addition to my mental list of great albuns, already listened to the whole thing multiple times and it’s still super good

A beautifully musical Celly to match the theme!

07/10/2024
(dd/MM/yyyy)

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Quills
item.description: My first post!? okay so first impressions are important right? even tho i don’t feel like writing much right now i want to have this be written at the same time i got this on this current state (that may or may not be the same your seeing this right now, cuz like, i’m writing […]
item.content:encoded:
My first post!? okay so first impressions are important right? even tho i don’t feel like writing much right now i want to have this be written at the same time i got this on this current state (that may or may not be the same your seeing this right now, cuz like, i’m writing this in the middle of just making this whole thing usable haha, but first things first, what should i mention… Oh right! I got the inspiration for trying this out after seeing @cushyhoof‘s site in this thread here (much better site than mine i’d say, can’t compare something hoof made from zero and my simple wordpress template based one haha, so you should check it out :3)

Anyway, yeah, this is more of a “Hi!” kind of post so i don’t really have much to say, guess i should explain some stuff tho
This is like, supposed to be kind of a brain dump were i can just post whatevers without really thinking much about it (or at least trying to haha) so please expect not the best writing, organization, design, update frequency and stuff like that here, cuz if i tried to go for that kind of thing i’d probably go insane. (oh my just noticed there’s no pony emojis on this, how will i express myself!?)

But at least i hope this lasts for more than today haha, well, i think i’ll do another post to say one other thing i want to so yeah, dialing out here, see you next post! ^c^

To finish this one, here, Puter honse!

07/10/2024
(dd/MM/yyyy)
